snippet: A government survey of manufacturing activity at larger companies showed greater expansion than expected, while HSBC’s survey of smaller companies showed contraction.
abstract: Chinese government survey of manufacturing activity at larger companies shows greater expansion than expected in May 2013, while HSBC’s survey of smaller companies shows contraction.
lead_paragraph: A government survey of manufacturing activity at larger companies showed greater expansion than expected, while HSBC’s survey of smaller companies showed contraction.

headline.seo: Chinese Manufacturing Appears to Be Stabilizing
headline.main: Manufacturing Growth in China Appears to Be Stabilizing
headline.print_headline: Manufacturing Growth in China Appears to Be Stabilizing
